data.text:
Kangotovo is a small village in the Turukhansk District of the Krasnoyarsk Territory, located on the right bank of the Yenisei. The climate here is sharply continental, subarctic.

In Kangotovo, you will see a mysterious world of the Tunguska Land. You will meet a real Ket camp, the mysterious anomalous Kangotovo mounds and indigenous representatives of the Kets people. Their population is just over 1000 people. You can participate in traditional fishing and swimming in warm weather. Walk to the Ket‚Äôs camp and get acquainted with a small people - the Kets. Sitting in the tent by the fire, you will learn many interesting local legends.
